price: E cedem o alimento - embora a ele apegados - a um necessitado e a um órfão e a um cativo,
arabic: وَيُطۡعِمُونَ ٱلطَّعَامَ عَلَىٰ حُبِّهِۦ مِسۡكِينٗا وَيَتِيمٗا وَأَسِيرًا

version.title: Portuguese Translation - Helmy Nasr
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Portugal by Dr. Helmy Nasr. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center -1440.

meta.transliteration: wayuṭ'ʿimūna al-ṭaʿāma ʿalā ḥubbihi mis'kīnan wayatīman wa-asīran
